features: 【Compatible with Video Doorbells Model】Compatible with Video Doorbell / Video Doorbell 2 / 3 / 3 Plus / 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release).The maximum size of video doorbell can be placed inside is 2.55inches Wide x 5.11inches High x 1.14inches depth. Please check the left picture No.3 for Compatible with model . (Doorbell is Not Included in Package)

【Flexible Installation】 No Drilling, use the strong 3M adhesive on the wall ,it will keep your Blink Doorbell Mount always stick on the door;or using screws and wall anchors, you can install wherever you want.（Warm Tips:After the adhesive tape,you need to press the adhesive doorbell for 2 minutes to become more sturdy.Prevent the doorbell from falling.）

【Stable and Simple】The Adhesive Video Doorbell Mount is made of upgraded ABS plastic material, not only can avoid rust and increase the use of time.Ultra-sticky adhesive 3M sticker can hold up to 3.2 lb, it will keeps your Video Doorbell firmly in place and never worried about it falling off.And all the holes are well designed and won't influence infrared night video and two-way audio.

【Upgrade the Design】Beautiful appearance with anti-theft design doorbell bracket, put the video doorbells fit perfectly inside, keep your video doorbell from being stolen when the door is closed.In addition,it can protect your doorbell camera from wind/rain/sun.

【Lifetime Guarantee】We provide 12 months product quality assurance. If you have any issues, please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to help you in less than 12 hours.We will offer the best service to every customer. Looking forward to your visit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adhesive Mount for Video Doorbell Specially designed for Most Brand Video Doorbell, ideal for condo, apartment ,office room,rental, dorm.It will protect your Camera Doorbell from all kinds of potential damage in any circumstance and prolong your device working life. 2 Ways Easy Installation,depends on you Ultra-sticky adhesive 3M Sticker keeps your Video Doorbell firmly in place.or using screws and wall anchors, you can install wherever you want. Full Coverage Protection The doorbell goes into the hard ABS box and the Screw in the screws at the bottom and attach them to the door and very secure！And it won't influence the 2-way audio or night vision, ensure your household safety in an all-round way.
Warm Tips : After the adhesive tape,you need to press the adhesive doorbell for 2 minutes to become more sturdy.Prevent the doorbell from falling,or install it on the wall with included screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Doorbell Mounting: Adhesive Door Doorbell Mount Review
reviews.reviewText: The Adhesive Door Doorbell Mount is a brilliant solution for hassle-free video doorbell installation. Its easy installation process, compatibility with various video doorbell models, and strong adhesive bond make it a standout choice. Whether you're a homeowner, renter, or office dweller, this mount offers a secure and stable platform without the need for drilling. I highly recommend the Adhesive Door Doorbell Mount to anyone seeking a convenient and reliable solution for mounting their video doorbell. It has simplified my home security upgrade, and I'm confident it will do the same for others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth it. I love it. I work away from home and sometimes I'm away for days at a time. I'm definitely gonna be buying one for my in-laws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3m tape doesn't hold well and impossible to charge ring without taking the whole thing off the door
reviews.reviewText: I'd give 5 stars however the 3m tape doesn't hold up to the hot sun and has fallen a few times and would prefer and easier way to take out my ring camera when it is ready for it to be charged it's a nightmare to get it out after you stick it to the door this is probably why it has fallen on multiple occasions in the heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not stay on my house.. has fallen several times.. my ring is now in the living room on my couch because it doesn’t stick like they said.. I e tried everything I could think of to help it stay and it doesn’t… really want my money back .. it is a waste of time money and effort.. not satisfied at all…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have had this ring for several months. We now feel safer in our home. We can also watch for skunks before walking out the door! We now have 3 ring cameras and think they are well worth the money!
